Package Game.Monsters

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
Game.GameObject
Game.Monsters.Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Slime, Snake, Spider, Worm
public abstract class Monster extends GameObject implements Cloneable
Represents a monster in the game.

    • Monster

      public Monster(int x, int y, Type type, Handler handler)
      Constructs a new Monster object.
      Parameters:
      x - The initial x-coordinate of the monster.
      y - The initial y-coordinate of the monster.
      type - The type of the monster.
      handler - The game handler managing the monster.
